https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/grNPsAdBFC2SHeYrew56TOMR8V7.jpg Harassed by bullies because of his mild autism, teen Ben finds refuge in an online computer game, which leads him to his virtual dream girl, Scarlite. Together, the odd couple seeks revenge against Ben's tormentors. Ben X
